item.title: By: Tomas
item.dc:creator: Tomas
item.description:
del.irio.us is so much nicer than del.icio.us
Perhaps I should grab that domain. Oh, damn it's taken already :-)
thanks for the pointer, and the nice cynical talks at ETech
